SendInvitePageBehaviour Class Reference SendInvitePageBehaviour
This class is responsible for creating a lobby page for the player to invite other players to play with them.

Detailed Description
This class is responsible for creating a lobby page for the player to invite other players to play with them.
makes sure that before the sending the invite you have a blob selected
One thing to still implemnent, when the button is pressed there should be a waiting screen, The buttons should hide and it should say blobbering... then once the transaction is rejected just show the buttons again if the transaction is succeded then we go into the lobbyListpage TODO
